fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player each night. You may choose to sell them Blue Sky or throw fulminated mercury at them.
- You will die after 62 days.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Selling Blue Sky to a player will roleblock them permanently due to their newfound meth addiction.
- Throwing fulminated mercury at someone will deal a powerful attack to them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Sell enough meth (3 meths) to give your family money after you die.
